name: X-Saber Perina
text: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send this card to the GY; Special Summon 2 "X-Saber" monsters from your Deck, except "X-Saber Perina", but destroy them during the End Phase. If this card is sent to the GY as material for an

Synchro Monster: You can apply 1 of these effects.
● It can make a second attack during each Battle Phase.
● It can attack directly.
You can only use each effect of "X-Saber Perina" once per turn.
